All the machines have gone nutty! First the scarecrows, then the golems. They act like they've been reprogrammed.

I'll be able to tell you if you bring me some stone hearts from the {@LinkCreature:19#2003#wild harvester} and {@LinkCreature:19#2001#crazed harvester golems}. Their programs are engraved on their hearts. We'll soon know if something has changed.

There are no instructions at all. Not the original programming, not new instructions...it's just blank.

How can they even move without instructions?

More questions than answers. Hate that. Well, thanks for bringing them to me, anyhow.
I really need those hearts if we're going to get to the bottom of this.
